title: Visiting Grandpa
subject_group: Family, Gender Identity, Relationships & Sexuality/Children - Family relationships

abstract: Visiting Grandpa at two, every Sunday. 'Screen It' 2013 Winner - Best Overall Primary School Entry.
description: My name is Mick and I enjoy lots of exciting activities but not the activity of visiting Grandpa every Sunday. That is, until I find a photo album and discover I have more in common with Grandpa than I can imagine. Come and explore how two different people make a connection.
